attributes.action: Make homework optional for students in secondary school in the uk
attributes.additional_details: I have suffered from mental health issues as a result of stress based off of homework, and I want to decrease the chance of younger people such as my brothers having the same problem, I just want to ask, please that the government would consider listening to me and help the future generations.
attributes.background: Homework makes some young teens and teenagers very stressed, if it were optional and we were told the benefits then people would feel a lot less pressure, this would help prevent some stressed based mental health issues that many people suffer from in later life
